```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr) 
library(lubridate)

```

```{r}

NEON_SOIL_CPER_1 <-read_csv("NEON_SOIL_CPER_1.csv")

NEON_SOIL_CPER_2 <-read_csv("NEON_SOIL_CPER_2.csv")

NEON_SOIL_CPER_3 <-read_csv("NEON_SOIL_CPER_1.csv")

```

```{r}

neon_soil_cper_total <- bind_rows(NEON_SOIL_CPER_1, NEON_SOIL_CPER_2, NEON_SOIL_CPER_3)

summary(neon_soil_cper_total)

```

```{r}

neon_SOIL_CPER_TOTAL_DAY <- neon_soil_cper_total %>%
  mutate(day = floor_date(startDateTime, unit = "day"))

summary(neon_SOIL_CPER_TOTAL_DAY)

```

```{r}

neon_SOIL_CPER_TOTAL_DAY %>% 
  group_by(day) %>% 
  summarize(mean_temp = mean(SHFMean)) 

```
